review_and_appreciate: Review and Appreciate: Did you start your week with a plan? See you on The Path
quote: “Every drop in the bucket counts\" Anonymous

step_of_the_day.title:
Take the most important step you can take today: Vote! Make a plan to vote sometime today (if you are in the
            United States) (Pillar #3 & 9)
step_of_the_day.content:
My third pillar of resilience is “relationship with something greater.\" Today we can relate this to your
            relationship with your community as well as giving service.

action_step:
Voting is not something you can do tomorrow or the next day. It must be done today, if not done
            already.Take today’s step and VOTE.
journal_entry: Write about how you connect to your community.
